dialogue.text: While you were gone, a spike from my empire had fallen on my head. I absorbed it and gained some new powers.
bop skai dip skidip rop (I guess this is how you "prepared" for the rematch?)
Yeah, it's how I prepared. But you should prepare to be destroyed.
bop skai dip bop skee (That wasn't that funny...)
That doesn't matter, comedic effect is not my priority!
Stop bickering please, let's start the song!
